day.comment: Add a quote, write a thought, create a theme for this day.
message.time: Task finish time must be set after the start time.
tasks.name: Task name
note.title: Title
message.taskexists: Task with this name already exists.
goals.name: Goal name
popover.question: Are you sure?
popover.goal1: This action is irreversible, it will
popover.goal2: remove all your progress for this goal.
modal.name: name
popover.goal4: remove all your goal progress and day tasks for this task,
quotes.ma1: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive – to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love. - Marcus Aurelius
quotes.wd1: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. – Walt Disney
quotes.sj1: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking. – Steve Jobs
quotes.ow1: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough. – Oprah Winfrey
quotes.te1: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. – Thomas A. Edison
quotes.q1: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated. – Confucius
quotes.hdt1: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. – Henry David Thoreau
quotes.ae1: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving. - Albert Einstein
quotes.mg1: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever. - Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.mg2: Be the change that you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.wwp1: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt. Sing like there's nobody listening; And live like it's heaven on earth. - William W. Purkey
quotes.mj1: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying. - Michael Jordan
quotes.gbs1: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself. - George Bernard Shaw
quotes.wj1: The greatest discovery of any generation is that a human can alter his life by altering his attitude. - William James
quotes.wj2: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action. - William James
quotes.wsc1: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston S. Churchill
quotes.er1: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway. - Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.ma2: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them. - Marcus Aurelius
quotes.ma3: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts. - Marcus Aurelius
quotes.hf1: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t, you’re right. - Henry Ford
quotes.rn1: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference. Reinhold Niebuhr
quotes.rc1: Success is the sum of small efforts – repeated day in and day out. - Robert Collier
quotes.wsc2: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm. - Winston S. Churchill
quotes.fn1: That which does not kill us makes us stronger. - Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.fn2: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once. - Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.er2: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life. - Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.er3: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. - Eleanor Roosevelt
message.addnote: Content and title cannot be empty.
quotes.er4: Do one thing every day that scares you. - Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.mt1: The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your complex, overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks, and then starting on the first one. - Mark Twain
